segments.pli: Aṅguttara Nikāya 3
segments.en: Numbered Discourses 3

segments.pli: 8. Ānandavagga
segments.en: 8. Ānanda

segments.pli: 79. Gandhajātasutta
segments.en: 79. Fragrances

segments.pli: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
segments.en: Then Venerable Ānanda went up to the Buddha, bowed, sat down to one side, and said to him:

segments.pli: “Tīṇimāni, bhante, gandhajātāni, yesaṃ anuvātaṃyeva gandho gacchati, no paṭivātaṃ.
segments.en: “Sir, there are these three kinds of fragrance that spread only with the wind, not against it.

segments.pli: Katamāni tīṇi?
segments.en: What three?

segments.pli: Mūlagandho, sāragandho, pupphagandho—
segments.en: The fragrance of roots, heartwood, and flowers.

segments.pli: imāni kho, bhante, tīṇi gandhajātāni, yesaṃ anuvātaṃyeva gandho gacchati, no paṭivātaṃ.
segments.en: These are the three kinds of fragrance that spread only with the wind, not against it.

segments.pli: Atthi nu kho, bhante, kiñci gandhajātaṃ yassa anuvātampi gandho gacchati, paṭivātampi gandho gacchati, anuvātapaṭivātampi gandho gacchatī”ti?
segments.en: Is there a kind of fragrance that spreads with the wind, and against it, and both ways?”

segments.pli: “Atthānanda, kiñci gandhajātaṃ yassa anuvātampi gandho gacchati, paṭivātampi gandho gacchati, anuvātapaṭivātampi gandho gacchatī”ti.
segments.en: “There is, Ānanda, such a kind of fragrance.”

segments.pli: “Katamañca pana, bhante, gandhajātaṃ yassa anuvātampi gandho gacchati, paṭivātampi gandho gacchati, anuvātapaṭivātampi gandho gacchatī”ti?
segments.en: “So what, sir, is that kind of fragrance?”

segments.pli: “Idhānanda, yasmiṃ gāme vā nigame vā itthī vā puriso vā buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti, dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti, saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti,
segments.en: “It’s when, Ānanda, in some village or town, a woman or man has gone for refuge to the Buddha, the teaching, and the Saṅgha.

segments.pli: pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti, adinnādānā paṭivirato hoti, kāmesumicchācārā paṭivirato hoti, musāvādā paṭivirato hoti, surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭivirato hoti, sīlavā hoti kalyāṇadhammo,
segments.en: They don’t kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, lie, or take alcoholic drinks that cause negligence. They’re ethical, of good character.

segments.pli: vigatamalamaccherena cetasā agāraṃ ajjhāvasati muttacāgo payatapāṇi vossaggarato yācayogo dānasaṃvibhāgarato.
segments.en: They live at home with a heart rid of the stain of stinginess, freely generous, open-handed, loving to let go, committed to charity, loving to give and to share.

segments.pli: Tassa disāsu samaṇabrāhmaṇā vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti:
segments.en: Ascetics and brahmins everywhere praise them for these good qualities;

segments.pli: ‘amukasmiṃ nāma gāme vā nigame vā itthī vā puriso vā buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti, dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti, saṃghaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti,
pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti, adinnādānā paṭivirato hoti, kāmesumicchācārā paṭivirato hoti, musāvādā paṭivirato hoti, surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭivirato hoti, sīlavā hoti kalyāṇadhammo,
vigatamalamaccherena cetasā agāraṃ ajjhāvasati muttacāgo payatapāṇi vossaggarato yācayogo dānasaṃvibhāgarato’ti.
devatāpissa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti:
segments.en: even the deities praise them.

segments.pli: ‘amukasmiṃ nāma gāme vā nigame vā itthī vā puriso vā buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti, dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti, saṃghaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti,
pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti … pe … surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭivirato hoti, sīlavā hoti kalyāṇadhammo,
vigatamalamaccherena cetasā agāraṃ ajjhāvasati muttacāgo payatapāṇi vossaggarato yācayogo dānasaṃvibhāgarato’ti.
Idaṃ kho taṃ, ānanda, gandhajātaṃ yassa anuvātampi gandho gacchati, paṭivātampi gandho gacchati, anuvātapaṭivātampi gandho gacchatīti.
segments.en: This is the kind of fragrance that spreads with the wind, and against it, and both.

segments.pli: Na pupphagandho paṭivātameti,
segments.en: The fragrance of flowers doesn’t spread against the wind,

segments.pli: Na candanaṃ tagaramallikā vā;
segments.en: nor sandalwood, pinwheel flowers, or jasmine;

segments.pli: Satañca gandho paṭivātameti,
segments.en: but the fragrance of the good spreads against the wind;

segments.pli: Sabbā disā sappuriso pavāyatī”ti.
segments.en: a good person’s virtue spreads in every direction.”

segments.pli: Navamaṃ.

suttaplex.blurb: Some fragrances spread even against the wind.
